advancement.destroy.aging_barrel.descrip: Use an Aging Barrel to produce a fermented drink
advancement.destroy.baby_blue_high.descr: Be under the effects of Baby Blue 1000 blocks up in the sky
advancement.destroy.beetroot_potato_cann: Shoot a mutated Beetroot from a Potato Cannon
advancement.destroy.capture_stray.descri: Capture a Stray with an empty Blaze Burner
advancement.destroy.centrifuge.descripti: Use a Centrifuge to separate two fluids
advancement.destroy.centrifuge_lubricate: Fully lubricate a Centrifuge so it is maximally efficient
advancement.destroy.distillation.descrip: Separate a fluid into parts by Distillation
advancement.destroy.dynamo_charging.desc: Charge an Item with a Dynamo
Start electrolyzing a fluid with a Dynamo
advancement.destroy.fix_pollution.descri: Bring the world from fully polluted to pollution-free
advancement.destroy.hyperaccumulate.desc: Use Hyperaccumulating Fertilizer to mutate a crop
advancement.destroy.mechanical_hands.des: Hear the flibbity jibbity jibber jabber
advancement.destroy.otswald_process.desc: Create Nitric Acid with a Rhodium catalyst
advancement.destroy.pollution.descriptio: Pollute the world as much as possible
advancement.destroy.pumpjack.description: Use a Pumpjack to extract Crude Oil
advancement.destroy.sand_castle.descript: Destroy a Baby Villager's sand castle, making it cry
advancement.destroy.seismometer.descript: Discover Crude Void Oil with a Seismometer
advancement.destroy.tear_bottle.descript: Collect the tears of a crying Mob to use for Salt
advancement.destroy.urinate.description: Urinate by crouching over a Cauldron while inebriated
badge.destroy.beta_tester.description: Help test upcoming features of Destroy
badge.destroy.content_creator.descriptio: Give Destroy free promotion by featuring it as a content creator
badge.destroy.developer.description: Create code or art for Destroy
badge.destroy.early_bird.description: Be among the first 1000 Players to play a major update to Destroy
badge.destroy.nitro.description: Boost the Discord server with Nitro
badge.destroy.patreon_1.description: Pledge to the first tier on the Destroy Patreon
badge.destroy.patreon_2.description: Go the full 7.77 yards and pledge to the second tier on the Destroy Patreon
badge.destroy.patreon_3.description: Show ultimate support by pledging to the highest tier on the Destroy Patreon
badge.destroy.suggestion.description: Contribute a new idea for Destroy that ends up getting implemented
badge.destroy.translator.description: Make an significant contribution to the localizations of Destroy
block.destroy.agar_block.tooltip.summary: A _nutrient-rich_ substance, perfect for harboring all sorts of _moulds_, _bacteria_ and _fungi_.
block.destroy.anfo_block.tooltip.behavio: Does _minimal damage_ to Mobs and _only_ explodes stones and dirt blocks, leaving ores and contraptions _untouched_.
block.destroy.cordite_block.tooltip.summ: An explosive that _vaporizes_ anything in its way, making it _optimal_ for mining for _Ancient Debris_.
block.destroy.cordite_block.tooltip.beha: _Evaporates_ liquids, doesn't drop items and does _minimal damage_ to mobs.
block.destroy.dynamite_block.tooltip.sum: This explosive is _perfect_ for cleanly _excavating_ areas. The _size_ and _shape_ of the area can be configured.
block.destroy.dynamite_block.tooltip.beh: Clears out a _perfect cuboid_ (except for _indestructible_ blocks) and doesn't drop items.
block.destroy.nitrocellulose_block.toolt: I haven't thought about what this one does yet.
block.destroy.pollutometer.tooltip.summa: A super high-tech device which can _quantifiably measure_ levels of _pollution_ in the world.
block.destroy.pollutometer.tooltip.condi: When Used as Display Link Source
block.destroy.pollutometer.tooltip.behav: Displays the level of the selected type of pollution
commands.destroy.babyblueaddiction.set.m: Set Baby Blue Addiction level of %s on %s players
commands.destroy.babyblueaddiction.set.s: Set Baby Blue Addiction level of %s on %s
commands.destroy.babyblueaddiction.query: %s has a Baby Blue Addiction level of %s
commands.destroy.crudeoil: Generated %s mB of Crude Oil in the chunk at [%s, %s, %s]
commands.destroy.pollution.query: Pollution of type %s has a level of %s
commands.destroy.pollution.set: Set level of Pollution of type %s to %s
destroy.chemistry.acid: Acids are species which can donate hydrogen ions ({protons, destroy:proton}) to other species. They react with {bases, destroy:base}.
destroy.chemistry.addition: An addition reaction is one in which a group is added to a {molecule, destroy:molecule}.
destroy.chemistry.addition_elimination: An addition-elimination reaction is one in which one group is removed from a {molecule, destroy:molecule}, and only then another is added - this is unlike a {substitution, destroy:substitution}, where both happen at once.
destroy.chemistry.addition_polymer: Addition {polymers, destroy:polymer} do not {condensate, destroy:condensation_polymer} a byproduct, and often proceed by {free-radical, destroy:radical} {mechanism, destroy:mechanism}.
destroy.chemistry.aqua_regia: Latin for 'royal water', aqua regia is a mixture of [destroy:nitric_acid] and [destroy:hydrochloric_acid] which can dissolve {noble, destroy:inert} metals like gold.
destroy.chemistry.atom: Atoms are tiny particles consisting of {positive, destroy:charge} {nuclei, destroy:nucleus} surrounded by {negative, destroy:charge} {electrons, destroy:electron}.
destroy.chemistry.base: Bases are species which can accept hydrogen ions ({protons, destroy:protons}) from other species. They react with {acids, destroy:acid}.
destroy.chemistry.bond: Two {atoms, destroy:atom} can bond by sharing a pair of {electrons, destroy:electron}. The {positive, destroy:charge} {nuclei, destroy:nucleus} of the atoms are attracted to the {negative, destroy:charge} {electrons, destroy:electron}, requiring lots of energy to be pulled apart.
destroy.chemistry.carbonylation: A carbonylation is a reaction with [destroy:carbon_monoxide].
destroy.chemistry.carboxylation: A carboxylation is a reaction with [destroy:carbon_dioxide]. It is the opposite of a {decarboxylation, destroy:decarboxylation}.
destroy.chemistry.charge: Charge is an innate property like mass. Things can be positively or negatively charged, and oppositely-charged things will attract each other whereas same-charged things will repel.
destroy.chemistry.catalyst: A catalyst is a substance that speeds up or enables a chemical reaction, without being used up itself.
destroy.chemistry.condensation_polymer: Condensation {polymers, destroy:polymer} such as DNA and nylon 'condensate' a small {molecule, destroy:molecule} such as [destroy:water].
destroy.chemistry.cycle: A cyclic {molecule, destroy:molecule} has a least one loop in its structure.
destroy.chemistry.decarboxylation: A decarboxylation is a reaction in which [destroy:carbon_dioxide] is {eliminated, destroy:elimination} from a {molecule, destroy:molecule}. It is the opposite of {carboxylation, destroy:carboxylation}.
destroy.chemistry.diene: A {molecule, destroy:molecule} which is a diene contains at least two {double bonds, destroy:double_bond} separated by a {single bond, destroy:bond}.
destroy.chemistry.dienophile: Dienophiles are {molecules, destroy:molecule} attracted to {dienes, destroy:diene} like alkenes and alkynes.
destroy.chemistry.disproportionation: Disproportionation is when the same species is both {oxidized, destroy:oxidation} and {reduced, destroy:reduction} in a reaction..
destroy.chemistry.double_bond: If two {atoms, destroy:atom} are double-{bonded, destroy:bond}, they share two pairs of {electrons, destroy:electron} between them rather than one.
destroy.chemistry.electron: Electrons are low-mass, {negatively, destroy:charge} charged {subatomic, destroy:subatomic} particles.
destroy.chemistry.electrophile: An electrophile is a species which can accept an {electron, destroy:electron} pair. They are the opposite of {nucleophiles, destroy:nucleophile}.
destroy.chemistry.elimination: An elimination reaction is one in which a group is removed from a {molecule, destroy:molecule}.
destroy.chemistry.hydrogenation: A hydrogenation reaction is a type of {reduction, destroy:reduction} with [destroy:hydrogen].
destroy.chemistry.ketone: A ketone is a type of [destroy:carbonyl] where the carbonyl carbon is {bonded, destroy:bond} to two other carbons (and no hydrogens).
destroy.chemistry.mechanism: A mechanism describes how a reaction happens - where {electrons, destroy:electron} move; what intermediate species there are.
destroy.chemistry.nucleophile: A nucleophile is a species which can donate an {electron, destroy:electron} pair. They are attracted to {positive, destroy:charge} areas ({nuclei, destroy:nucleus} are positive, hence the name). They are the opposite of {electrophiles, destroy:electrophile}.
destroy.chemistry.neutron: A neutron is a neutral (not {charged, destroy:charge}) particle found in the {nucleus, destroy:nucleus} of an {atom, destroy:atom}.
destroy.chemistry.nucleus: At the center of each {atom, destroy:atom} is a nucleus, consisting of {protons, destroy:proton} and {neutrons, destroy:neutron}.
destroy.chemistry.oxidation: An {atom, destroy:atom} is oxidized when it loses {electron(s), destroy:electron}, often by reaction with [destroy:oxygen]. Oxidation is the opposite of {reduction, destroy:reduction}.
destroy.chemistry.proton: A proton is a {positive, destroy:charge} {subatomic, destroy:subatomic} particle found in the {nucleus, destroy:nucleus}. The number of protons in an {atom, destroy:atom} determines what element it is.
destroy.chemistry.polymer: 'Poly' is Greek for 'many', as polymers are {molecules, destroy:molecule} containing many repeating 'monomers'. Plastics are all polymers, and types include {addition-, destroy:addition_polymer} and {condensation-, destroy:condensation_polymer} polymers.
destroy.chemistry.radical: While most species contain {electrons, destroy:electron} in pairs, radicals are species with unpaired electrons, and are often very reactive.
destroy.chemistry.radical_initiator: Radical initiators are species which produce {radicals, destroy:radical}, and can kick-start a {polymerisation, destroy:polymer} reaction.
destroy.chemistry.reduction: An {atom, destroy:atom} is reduced when it gains {electron(s), destroy:electron}. Reduction is the opposite of {oxidation, destroy:oxidation}.
destroy.chemistry.substitution: A substitution reaction is one in which one group on a {molecule, destroy:molecule} is quickly replaced by another.
destroy.chemistry.sequestration: Sequestration is the capture of a gas, to allow it to be stored as a solid or liquid.
destroy.chemistry.syngas: Synthesis gas, or 'syngas' is a mixture of [destroy:carbon_dioxide] and [destroy:hydrogen].
destroy.chemistry.thermal_decomposition: Thermal decomposition, or pyrolysis, is the spontaneous breakdown of a species when heated.
destroy.chemistry.unknown_definition: Unknown definition - report this as a bug.
destroy.ponder.tag.chemistry.description: Components which can be used to manipulate Mixtures
destroy.ponder.tag.destroy.description: Components and Curiosities added by the mod Destroy
destroy.ponder.aging_barrel.header: Fermenting beverages with the Aging Barrel
destroy.ponder.aging_barrel.text_1: Aging Barrels, like Basins, can be filled with fluids and items.
destroy.ponder.aging_barrel.text_2: Over a long time, the Aging Barrel will create a new fluid.
destroy.ponder.aging_barrel.text_3: The Aging Barrel is also the workplace of the Innkeeper, who sells Yeast at the Apprentice level.
destroy.ponder.bubble_cap.header: Distilling fluids with the Bubble Cap
destroy.ponder.bubble_cap.text_1: Vertically stacked Bubble Caps create a Distillation Tower.
destroy.ponder.bubble_cap.text_2: Distillation Towers will automatically distill fluids in the bottom-most Cap (the Reboiler).
destroy.ponder.bubble_cap.text_3: The higher the boiling point of the fluid, the further up the Tower it will travel.
destroy.ponder.bubble_cap.text_4: Some Distillation recipes require a heater underneath the Reboiler.
destroy.ponder.centrifuge.text_1: The Centrifuge will slowly separate any fluid pumped into the top.
destroy.ponder.centrifuge.text_2: The denser resultant fluid can be extracted from the side.
destroy.ponder.centrifuge.text_3: The lighter resultant fluid can be extracted from the bottom.
destroy.ponder.centrifuge.text_4: The Centrifuge does not actively pump out fluids - a Mechanical Pump must be used.
destroy.ponder.centrifuge.text_5: Lubrication can be applied to increase the processing speed.
destroy.ponder.coaxial_gear_shaftless.he: Using Coaxial Cogwheels as shaftless Cogwheels
destroy.ponder.coaxial_gear_shaftless.te: Coaxial Cogwheels connect similarly to regular Cogwheels.
However, they have no Shaft, allowing for configurations that would be impossible with regular Cogwheels.
destroy.ponder.coaxial_gear_through.head: Rotating Shafts through Coaxial Cogwheels
destroy.ponder.coaxial_gear_through.text: Use a Coaxial Cogwheel on a Shaft to surround it.
You can also use a Shaft on a Coaxial Cogwheel.
In either case, there must be at least two Shaft blocks.
The Shaft rotates completely independently of the Coaxial Cogwheel.
They can even rotate at different speeds and in different directions.
destroy.ponder.double_cardan_shaft.heade: Relaying rotational force with Double Cardan Shafts
destroy.ponder.double_cardan_shaft.text_: Using two mechanisms called 'universal joints', Double Cardan Shafts can relay rotatation around a corner.
Use a Wrench to rotate them around the axis you clicked.
destroy.ponder.dynamo_redstone.header: Creating Redstone signals with the Dynamo
destroy.ponder.dynamo_redstone.text_1: A Dynamo will confer a Redstone signal to the block directly beneath.
destroy.ponder.dynamo_redstone.text_2: The strength of the signal is proportional to the rotational speed of the Dynamo.
destroy.ponder.dynamo_charging.text_1: The Dynamo can process items provided beneath it.
destroy.ponder.dynamo_charging.text_2: Items can be dropped or placed on a Depot underneath the Dynamo.
destroy.ponder.phytomining.text_1: Hyperaccumulating Fertilizer can be used like Bone Meal to mutate certain crops.
destroy.ponder.phytomining.text_2: Some mutations result in the uptake of ores placed a block below the farmland.
destroy.ponder.planetary_gearset.header: Out-of-this-world gearing with the Planetary Gearset
destroy.ponder.planetary_gearset.text_1: Planetary Gearsets connect almost identically to Large Cogwheels (press Q to learn more about these).
destroy.ponder.planetary_gearset.text_2: However, the Shaft of a Planetary Gearset rotates twice as fast, and in the opposite direction to the teeth.
destroy.ponder.pumpjack.header: Extracting Crude Oil with the Pumpjack
destroy.ponder.pumpjack.text_1: Locate Crude Oil with a Handheld Seismometer.
destroy.ponder.pumpjack.text_2: When powered anywhere in a chunk containing an oil reserve, the Pumpjack will slowly extract Crude Oil.
destroy.ponder.pumpjack.text_3: The Pumpjack does not actively pump out the Oil - a Mechanical Pump must still be used.
destroy.reaction.aibn_synthesis.descript: A two-step synthesis in reality, which produces the {radical initiator, destroy:radical_initiator} [destroy:aibn].
destroy.reaction.andrussow_process.descr: A high-temperature platinum-{catalyzed, destroy:catalyst} method for the production of [destroy:hydrogen_cyanide].
destroy.reaction.anthraquinone_process.d: The second step in the production of [destroy:hydrogen_peroxide] by the reduction of [destroy:oxygen] by [destroy:ethylanthrahydroquinone].
destroy.reaction.anthraquinone_reduction: The first step in the production of [destroy:hydrogen_peroxide] - {hydrogenating, destroy:hydrogenation} [destroy:ethylanthraquinone].
destroy.reaction.basic_diels_alder_react: A Diels-Alder reaction is a type of {cyclization, destroy:cycle} that occurs between a {diene, destroy:diene} and a {dienophile, destroy:dienophile}.
destroy.reaction.benzene_ethylation.desc: An {acid, destroy:acid}-{catalyzed, destroy:catalyst} method to produce [destroy:ethylbenzene].
destroy.reaction.carbon_capture.descript: A method of {sequestering, destroy:sequestration} [destroy:carbon_dioxide] by reaction with calcium oxide.
destroy.reaction.carbon_tetrachloride_fl: The {substitution, destroy:substitution} of chlorine for fluorine in [destroy:carbon_tetrachloride] to produce various fluorinated products.
destroy.reaction.chlorine_haloform_react: Repeated chlorination of the slightly {acidic, destroy:acid} {ketone, destroy:ketone} group, followed by a {nucleophilic, destroy:nucleophile} {substitution, destroy:substitution} to form a carboxylate.
destroy.reaction.chlorine_solvation.desc: The dissolution of [destroy:chlorine] in [destroy:water] under UV light.
destroy.reaction.chloroform_fluorination: A method for the production of [destroy:chlorodifluoromethane], a refrigerant and PTFE precursor.
destroy.reaction.cumene_process.descript: A method of producing [destroy:phenol] and [destroy:acetone] by the {oxidation, destroy:oxidation} of [destroy:benzene] and [destroy:propene], via a {free radical, destroy:radical} {mechanism, destroy:mechanism}.
destroy.reaction.cyclohexene_oxidative_c: The breaking of a {bond, destroy:double_bond} in [destroy:cyclohexene] by {oxidation, destroy:oxidation} with [destroy:hydrogen_peroxide].
destroy.reaction.ethylanthraquinone_synt: A method for the production of [destroy:ethylanthraquinone].
destroy.reaction.ethylbenzene_dehydrogen: The de{hydrogenation, destroy:hydrogenation} of [destroy:ethylbenzene] by superheated steam to produce [destroy:styrene].
destroy.reaction.gold_dissolution.descri: The dissolving of gold in {aqua regia, destroy:aqua_regia}.
destroy.reaction.glycerol_nitration.desc: A method for the production of [destroy:nitroglycerine] (dynamite) by reacting [destroy:glycerol] with [destroy:nitric_acid] and [destroy:sulfuric_acid].
destroy.reaction.haber_process.descripti: A famous method for the production of [destroy:ammonia].
destroy.reaction.hydrogen_chloride_synth: A synthesis of [destroy:hydrochloric_acid] from its constituent elements.
destroy.reaction.hydrogen_iodide_synthes: A method for the production of [destroy:hydrogen_iodide].
destroy.reaction.hydroxide_neutralizatio: The reaction of an {acid, destroy:acid} and a {base, destroy:base} to produce [destroy:water].
The {disproportionation, destroy:disproportionation} of [destroy:chlorine] with sodium hydroxide.
destroy.reaction.mercury_fulmination.des: An antique method for the production of the primary explosive, fulminated mercury.
destroy.reaction.methanol_synthesis.desc: A method for the produciton of [destroy:methanol] from {syngas, destroy:syngas}.
destroy.reaction.methyl_acetate_carbonyl: A method for the production of [destroy:acetic_anhydride] by the {carbonylation, destroy:carbonylation} of [destroy:methyl_acetate].
destroy.reaction.nhn_synthesis.descripti: A method for the production of nickel hydrazine nitrate.
destroy.reaction.nitronium_formation.des: The [destroy:nitronium] ion is formed in 'nitrating acid' - it is an {electrophile, destroy:electrophile} which reacts to form many explosives.
destroy.reaction.orthoxylene_oxidation.d: The [destroy:mercury]-{catalyzed, destroy:catalyst} {oxidation, destroy:oxidation} of [destroy:orthoxylene] to [destroy:phthalic_anhydride] in air.
destroy.reaction.ostwald_process.descrip: A rhodium-{catalyzed, destroy:catalyst} method for the production of [destroy:nitric_acid]. The Ostwald Process is closely linked to the Haber Process.
destroy.reaction.peroxide_process.descri: The {ketone, destroy:ketone}-{catalyzed, destroy:catalyst} {oxidation, destroy:oxidation} of [destroy:ammonia] to [destroy:hydrazine].
destroy.reaction.tatp.description: A dangerous way of producing an explosive, which has injured many an amatuer chemist.
destroy.reaction.steam_reformation.descr: A method for the production of {syngas, destroy:syngas}.
destroy.reaction.sodium_dissolution.desc: The violent reaction of [destroy:sodium] and [destroy:water] that earns the {alkali, destroy:base} metals their name.
destroy.reaction.vinyl_acetate_synthesis: A palladium-{catalyzed, destroy:catalyst} method for the production of [destroy:vinyl_acetate].
destroy.tooltip.basin.too_full.title: Overfilled:
destroy.tooltip.basin.too_full: This Basin contains _too much_ Mixture to react. Try a _Vat_ instead.
destroy.tooltip.coaxial_gear.shaft_too_s: Shafts must be at least two blocks in length to go through a Coaxial Cogwheel
destroy.tooltip.mixture_ingredient.molec: Must contain _%1$s_ at a concentraion of approximately _%2$sM_. All other molecules must be _solvents_ or _low in concentration_.
destroy.tooltip.seismometer.crude_oil: There are about %1$s bucket(s) of Crude Oil in this chunk
destroy.tooltip.vat.not_initialized: A valid Vat could _not_ be formed. _Click_ to try again, or _Ponder_ the _Vat Controller_ to learn more.
destroy.tooltip.vat.not_submerged: This pipe is _above_ the level of Mixture in this Vat. It can _still insert_ Mixtures, but can _only extract gases_.
effect.destroy.cancer.description: Has no effect in-game. Many things in the Destroy Mod are jokes, but cancer is not one of them. This is here to raise awareness of the increase in cancer risk associated with occupational exposure, and with harm to the ozone layer. Please see a professional source like 'cancerresearchuk.org'.
effect.destroy.crying.description: Releases tears, which can be bottled.
effect.destroy.fragance.description: Negates the effect of Smelly chemicals on the user.
effect.destroy.hangover.description: Deals damage every time a loud noise is heard; curable with Aspirin.
effect.destroy.inebriation.description: Causes drunken slipping; higher levels also cause nausea, blindess and eventually alcohol poisoning.
effect.destroy.baby_blue_high.descriptio: Boosts speed, strength and haste, but is addictive; after the high wears off, the user will experience a withdrawal for a length of time dependent on how addicted they are. At high addiction levels, the user may overdose.
effect.destroy.baby_blue_withdrawal: Causes slowness, weakness and fatigue, and prevents eating; only curable by taking more Baby Blue.
effect.destroy.sun_protection.descriptio: Protects the user from harmful UV radiation if the World's Ozone Level is too low.
item.destroy.anfo.tooltip.summary: Read that again slowly. That's right, _an foe_. ANFO is _not your friend_.
item.destroy.aspirin_syringe.tooltip.sum: The perfect remedy for those _awful migraines_.
item.destroy.aspirin_syringe.tooltip.con: Hold Syringe in Offhand, hold L-click with empty Mainhand
item.destroy.baby_blue_powder.tooltip.be: Gives a strong, short-lasting _Baby Blue High_, followed by a _Baby Blue Withdrawal_.
item.destroy.baby_blue_syringe.tooltip.b: Gives a weak, long-lasting _Baby Blue High_, followed by a _Baby Blue Withdrawal_.
item.destroy.baby_blue_syringe.tooltip.c: Hold Syringe in Offhand, hold L-click with empty Mainhand
item.destroy.bomb_bon.tooltip.summary: This delicious _Blaze Burner_ treat has a sensation ever-so-slightly more severe than that of _popping candy_.
item.destroy.bomb_bon.tooltip.condition1: When used as Potato Cannon Ammunition
item.destroy.bucket_and_spade.tooltip.su: A timeless British toy, which is fun for literally _minutes_ on end.
item.destroy.bucket_and_spade.tooltip.co: When given to a Baby Villager
item.destroy.bucket_and_spade.tooltip.be: The _Villager_ will try and construct a _sand castle_, which they would be _very sad_ to see destroyed.
item.destroy.chorus_wine_bottle.dynamic_: A delectable beverage made of _Chorus Fruit_. The fermentation process has _honed the ability_ of the Fruit.
Increases _Inebration_ and _teleports_ you to your position roughly _%1$s seconds ago_, if it is _safe_ to do so.
item.destroy.cisplatin_syringe.tooltip.s: A real-life chemotherapeutic agent. Find out more and support developments of treatments at _cancerresearch.uk_.
item.destroy.cisplatin_syringe.tooltip.c: Hold Syringe in Offhand, hold L-click with empty Mainhand
item.destroy.coal_infused_beetroot.toolt: When used as Potato Cannon Ammunition
item.destroy.copper_infused_beetroot.too: The _Copper infusion_ means this _Beetroot_ is _buzzing with electricity_.
When used as Potato Cannon Ammunition
item.destroy.diamond_drill_bit.tooltip.s: With a Mohs Hardness of _eleven_, this pointy prick could even cut through _Bedrock_.
item.destroy.diamond_infused_beetroot.to: Infused with _thousands of rock-hard splinters_ that excel in _tearing apart_ stomach lining.
When used as Potato Cannon Ammunition
item.destroy.dirty_coal.tooltip.summary: Strange, because one doesn't think of _Coal_ as particularly _clean_ to begin with.
item.destroy.emerald_infused_beetroot.to: Infused with _Beryl_, which is berry good for one's jumping muscles. (Disclaimer: not really. Beryl is chronically toxic.)
When used as Potato Cannon Ammunition
item.destroy.fluorite_infused_beetroot.t: A _glimmering_ specimen that leaves one _weak_ in the knees. And the arms. And _everywhere_, actually.
When used as Potato Cannon Ammunition
Particularly effective in persuading _psychotic Mexican drug dealers_.
item.destroy.gas_mask.tooltip.summary: Safely _filters_ the air breathed by the wearer.
item.destroy.gas_mask.tooltip.behaviour1: Negates the effect of _toxic_ and _smelly_ chemicals, but _wears down_ over time.
item.destroy.gold_infused_beetroot.toolt: Gold doesn't _tarnish_, and nor does this _Beetroot_.
When used as Potato Cannon Ammunition
item.destroy.hazmat_leggings.tooltip.sum: Together with the _Gas Mask_, _Hazmat Suit_ and _Wellington Boots_, protects the wearer from nasty substances.
item.destroy.hazmat_leggings.tooltip.beh: Negates the effects of _corrosive_ and _caustic_ chemicals.
item.destroy.hazmat_suit.tooltip.summary: Together with the _Gas Mask_, _Hazmat Leggings_ and _Wellington Boots_, protects the wearer from nasty substances.
item.destroy.hazmat_suit.tooltip.behavio: Negates the effect of _corrosive_ and _caustic_ chemicals.
item.destroy.hefty_beetroot.tooltip.summ: This _vast vegetable_ is a _veritable vestige_ of _vitamins_.
item.destroy.iodine.tooltip.summary: A dull grey solid which nevertheless produces _annoying_ yellow stains anywhere you leave it.
item.destroy.iodine.tooltip.behaviour1: Releases purple fumes which can be collected as if it were _Dragon Breath_.
item.destroy.iron_infused_beetroot.toolt: The scientific name for _Beetroot_ is _Beta Vulgaris_. But not this. This is _Alpha Bulgaris_.
When used as Potato Cannon Ammunition
item.destroy.lapis_infused_beetroot.tool: Brimming with whatever _magic_ it is that makes _Enchantments_ work.
When used as Potato Cannon Ammunition
item.destroy.napalm_sundae.tooltip.summa: The only flavour of ice-cream that also sets you on fire. Your _Blaze Burners_ love it so much they even eat the bowl.
item.destroy.nickel_infused_beetroot.too: A _succulent_ vegetable that leaves one _craving for more_.
When used as Potato Cannon Ammunition
item.destroy.perfume_bottle.tooltip.summ: This _scrumptious aroma_ can mask even the _foulest_ of pongs.
item.destroy.playwell.tooltip.summary: Any resemblance to other brick-based building toys is _entirely coincidental_.
item.destroy.playwell.tooltip.condition1: When given to a Baby Villager (aged 3-99)
item.destroy.playwell.tooltip.behaviour1: The _Villager_ will build a _LEG-_ I mean, _Playwell_ house they would be _very sad_ to see destroyed.
item.destroy.potato_o.tooltip.summary: Why do Potate-Os make such _terrible liars_? You can _see right through them_!
item.destroy.redstone_infused_beetroot.t: Infused with dust that tastes so bad it actually _hurts_.
When used as Potato Cannon Ammunition
item.destroy.seismometer.tooltip.summary: A handy tool for determining how much _Crude Void Oil_ is near.
item.destroy.seismometer.tooltip.conditi: When There is a Nearby Explosion
item.destroy.seismometer.tooltip.behavio: Indicates the volume of _Crude Void Oil_ in the chunk.
item.destroy.shampoo_bottle.tooltip.summ: This valuable lesson in _heterophones_ will, in fact, _thoroughly agitate_ the eyes.
item.destroy.soap.tooltip.summary: Yes, it is called a _Cake_. A _Bar_ of Soap is much bigger, different thing entirely. _Look it up_.
item.destroy.sunscreen_bottle.tooltip.su: Shields you from the _big ball of fire in the sky_.
item.destroy.sunscreen_bottle.tooltip.be: Grants _Sun Protection_ for a while, which protects the user from _harmful UV radiation_ if the world's _ozone level_ is too low.
item.destroy.tear_bottle.summary: Tears collected from a _crying_ mob or player.
item.destroy.thermite_brownie.tooltip.su: This brownie is even spicier than normal. Your _Blaze Burners_ love them.
item.destroy.touch_powder.tooltip.summar: An _extremely sensitive_ explosive which can detonate if so much as _touched_. Useful with a _Seismometer_.
item.destroy.touch_powder.tooltip.behavi: What do you think it does?!
item.destroy.vegemite_sandwich.tooltip.b: Transforms them into a citizen of _The Land Down Under_.
item.destroy.wellington_boots.tooltip.su: These stylish shoes were hand-crafted by the _Duke of Wellington_ himself. Together with the _Gas Mask_, _Hazmat Suit_ and _Hazmat Leggings_, they protect the wearer from nasty substances.
item.destroy.wellington_boots.tooltip.be: Negates the effect of _corrosive_ and _caustic_ chemicals.
item.destroy.white_wheat.tooltip.summary: The type of wheat they used to eat in _the olden days_, back when everything was in _black and white_.
item.destroy.yeast.tooltip.summary: This fun fungus is a _fermentation_ fundemental.
item.destroy.zinc_infused_beetroot.toolt: When used as Potato Cannon Ammunition
item.destroy.zirconium_pants.tooltip.sum: Even before we were _married_ you could never shut up about how _great_ you were.
